name: Magician Mania
description:
Description

Magictopia, the capital city for magicians, is home to the Magician’s Grand Stage where Magicians from all over compete to entertain the audience.  Use your set of Magic moves to entertain the audience. But be careful, other magicians will try to win the audience away from you. Be the first to get a standing ovation and win the hearts of the audience.

How to Play

Select a card by clicking on it. The game will begin when you click a card.

Use the cards and their abilities to push your side of the bar (the blue side) to the right of the screen.

Each turn you pre for your next move and gain energy. Cards require enough energy to be played.

Known Bugs
  • Card effects are not currently implemented and will only give the standard amount of audience affection.
  • The audience affection bar will jitter around but displays audience affection correctly.
  • There is no win/lose state currently.
Playtest Questions:
  • What types of cards or upgrades would you like to see? 
  • What types of enemies would you like to see added to the game?
  • Does the overall movement of the affection slider feel good?
  • Is there any other additions you would like to see?
